functions.name: ALERT
functions.description:
ALERT
Display a message as an alert in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the alert

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the alert

functions.name: INVALID
functions.description:
INVALID
Display a validation error message and stop the record, or repeatable item, from being saved.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The validation error message content for the alert

examples:
INVALID('Depth must be less than 20.')

// Displays an alert and stops the record from being saved

functions.name: OPENURL
functions.description:
OPENURL
Open a URL for a website or mobile app.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to open

examples:
OPENURL('https://www.google.com/search?q=Fulcrum+Mobile+Solutions')

// Opens a web browser to the specified address

OPENURL('comgooglemaps://?q=Pizza&center=37.759748,-122.427135')

// Opens google maps and searches for Pizza near a location

OPENURL('mailto:clark.griswold@gmail.com?subject=turn+those+lights+off!&body=jk,+i+love+them.')

// Opens an email client with a predefined subject and body

functions.name: PROGRESS
functions.description:
PROGRESS
Display a non-dismissible progress message in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the progress message

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the progress alert

examples:
PROGRESS()

// Call with no parameters to dismiss the progress message.

functions.name: REQUEST
functions.description:
REQUEST
Performs an HTTP request and executes the callback on completion.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The options to pass for the request

parameters.name: options.url
parameters.description: The url for the request

parameters.name: options.method
parameters.description: The HTTP method for the request (POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

parameters.name: options.followRedirect
parameters.description: Should the request follow any redirects

parameters.name: options.headers
parameters.description: An object containing keys and values for additional header items

parameters.name: options.qs
parameters.description: An object containing query string parameters (url parameters)

parameters.name: options.json
parameters.description: An object to be passed in the request body, must be `JSON.stringify`able

parameters.name: options.body
parameters.description: The request body to send with a POST or PUT request

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to call when the request is complete - The function is passed `error`, `response`, and `body` parameters

functions.name: SETDESCRIPTION
functions.description:
SETDESCRIPTION
Set the description of a field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The data name for the field

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set for the field's description

examples:
SETDESCRIPTION('weather_summary', 'Could not automatically fetch weather data. Briefly describe the current weather.')

// Sets the description of a weather summary field

functions.name: SETHIDDEN
functions.description:
SETHIDDEN
Set the visibility of a field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The data name for the field

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: Boolean value representing whether the field should be hidden

examples:
SETHIDDEN('weather_summary', true)

// Hides the weather summary field

SETHIDDEN('weather_summary', false)

// Shows the weather summary field

SETHIDDEN('weather_summary', null)

// Unsets any override previously set by SETHIDDEN and uses the original setting from the form schema

functions.name: SETLABEL
functions.description:
SETLABEL
Set the label of a field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The data name for the field

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: The text for the field label

examples:
SETLABEL('weather_summary', 'Weather Report')

// Sets the field's label to 'Weather Report'

SETLABEL('weather_summary', null)

// Unsets any override previously set by SETLABEL and uses the original setting from the form schema

functions.name: SETVALUE
functions.description:
SETVALUE
Set the value of a field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The data name for the field to set

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set for the field

examples:
SETVALUE('weather_summary', 'Just beautiful')

// Sets the value of a weather summary field

functions.name: SETREADONLY
functions.description:
SETREADONLY
Sets a field to be read-only or editable.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The data name

parameters.name: readOnly
parameters.description: Boolean value representing whether the field should be read-only

examples:
SETREADONLY('weather_summary', true)

// Sets the field to read only, not editable by the user

SETREADONLY('weather_summary', false)

// Sets the field to be active, editable by the user

SETREADONLY('weather_summary', null)

// Unsets any override previously set by SETREADONLY and uses the original setting from the form schema
